name: Ice Age Race - Free Kids Racing Games
name_original: Ice Age Race - Free Kids Racing Games
description:
'Ice Age Race' is an adventure and action packed game with awesome 3d graphics. It is stunningly presented as combination of combat, exploration and endless running.

  Features:
 * Original and adorable 8 Characters to unlock. 
* Beautiful and vibrant 10 themes. 
* Simple Touch Screen Controls.
 * High Score dashboard for endless replay. 
* Amazing Lighting and Special Effects. 
* Awesome original soundtrack and sound effects. 
* Universal App with support for iPhone 5 and iPad 3.
